column4: question: I have an old Windows hardrive that has a game I'm rather fond of; if I get an external hard drive enclosure will I be able to boot from that through a USB connection and play my game effectively? Is there a better solution?
it depends on whether or not your motherboard supports booting from a USB device.
find out what model of mother board you have (lshw _might_ be able to tell you) and check the manufacturers specs.
